duties_responsibilities.duty: Creation of top level assembly models in NX.
Creation of new detailed components and subassemblies.
Creation of new design options for new customer requirements and following these designs through purchasing, testing, and operations.
Conduct and supporting internal design reviews.
Support customer meetings as technical focal.
Conducting peer reviews of models and drawings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering from accredited four-year college or university (Master's preferred)
